interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Philip Kingsley Body-Building Volumizing Hair Products Set - Shampoo, Conditioner, Root Boosting Volumizer Spray and Hair Plumping Volume Cream for Lifting Fine, Limp, Flat, Flyaway Hair
Review Date: 2022/10/26
Store: PHILIP KINGSLEY
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PHILIP KINGSLEY', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.51 x 1.81 inches; 11.43 Ounces'}
Review Text: The products in this are super small-they almost seem like sample sizes. After I used the shampoo and conditioner my hair felt really greasy and knotty. This isn’t a brand I could see myself sticking to.
Review Title: Seems like sample sizes
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
Beauty Bakerie
['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.']
{'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'}
The packaging is pretty and it is very pigmented and smudge proof. It lasts long and is a very cute color.
Nice packaging and good quality
9 Pcs Silicone Makeup Brush Cover, Reusable Dustproof Makeup Brush Protector Cap,Travel Makeup Brush Storage Holder, 2 Styles with 4 Sizes for Different Sizes Makeup Brush
QrBxa
{'Brand': 'QrBxa', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Number of Pieces': '9', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Handle Material': 'Silicone', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Package Dimensions': '4.76 x 3.54 x 1.38 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '799904670586'}
I love these silicone brushholders. I’m a little bit of a Germafobe when it comes to combining all of my make up brushes into one bag, the silicone holders go over the top of your brush head to keep them protected. They’re great for traveling, it comes with three big silicone heads and six little silicone heads for smaller brushes like eyeshadow brushes. Going to be buying more.
perfect for traveling
Everyday Beauty Radiance Cleanser, Rejuvenating Antioxidant Gel Cleanser with Rose Hip Seed Oil, Vitamin A, C, and E for All Skin Types to Soothe and Nourish Dry Damaged Skin, 4fl oz. Pump Bottle
Everyday Beauty
{'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Material Type Free': 'Cruelty-free,Gluten-free,Non-gmo,Sulfates', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 1.81 x 1.77 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002336', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'}
I use this product in combination with the hydrating mask, also from the Everyday Beauty brand. I like this one especially because it replenishes and refreshes my skin as advertised. I love the pump bottle and I use it in the shower to help combat dry skin.
Great product!!
L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel | Blush
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 3.1 x 3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2459', 'UPC': '810108191315'}
I loved this hairbrush. I got this for myself since I recently cut my bangs. This gives the perfect blowout for your hair and gives my bangs that volume and curl that they need. It’s extremely light which I love because it’s not one of those huge & heavy blow drying brushes. This allows the perfect amount of airflow and it gets the job done nicely!
Extremely Light
CELLEANSER Vegan Clean Cream 100% Vegan Ingredients Hydrating Nourishing Anti-Aging Balancing Panthenol Silky Made in Korea 60ml 2.02 fl.oz.
Celleanser
{'Brand': 'Celleanser', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '2.02 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 1.65 x 1.65 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
I am careful about what I put on my skin but I started using this cleanser every morning and noticed drastic results in brake outs and the clarity of my skin. The bottle is smaller than expected, but I will definitely be buying this again.
Love this cleanser!
BAR;SOO - Natural boar bristle paddle cushion hair brush for Thick Curly Thin Long Short hair, Detangle all types of hair, Hair loss prevention, Naturally glossy Hair (Purple/violet)
BAR;SOO
{'Brand': 'BAR;SOO', 'Color': 'Purple,Violet', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Nylon', 'Special Feature': 'Detangling', 'Package Dimensions': '10.83 x 5.59 x 2.01 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'Country of Origin': 'Korea, Republic of'}
This is such a cute brush. It’s made well and with quality, especially the bristle hairs. The bristles aren’t tough, hard or irritating to the scalp. It works great on my long thick hair and no Bristles have popped out yet!
Comfortable to the Scalp
Shower Cap for Women Reusable Long Hair Double Waterproof Large Shower Hair Hat Adjustable (11 inches, Pink, Black, Bowknot)
WhaleLife
{'Brand': 'WhaleLife', 'Material': 'Elastic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 4.53 x 1.14 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '759263505189'}
This cap is definitely one of the better ones I’ve used. The material doesn’t feel cheap and it’s not super thin either which I like. It has an elastic band so it’s comfortable and the cap is able to capture all of my long hair. The cap is cute as well and I love using this for whenever I want to shower but not wash my hair.
Quality Cap
Philip Kingsley Body-Building Volumizing Hair Products Set - Shampoo, Conditioner, Root Boosting Volumizer Spray and Hair Plumping Volume Cream for Lifting Fine, Limp, Flat, Flyaway Hair
PHILIP KINGSLEY

The products in this are super small-they almost seem like sample sizes. After I used the shampoo and conditioner my hair felt really greasy and knotty. This isn’t a brand I could see myself sticking to.
